Author: llllllllambtalk
Text: Boy do I feel ya. I started doing Yoga with Adriene on YouTube when I feel like binging. I find her amazing and suited for beginners and she says a lot of stuff about loving yourself and treating yourself with love. I hate myself but during the videos I try to just get into it and listen to her. (if you're interested I've been doing her "revolution: 31 days of yoga" playlist)
